promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic deer steel-type pokemon wearing golden bracers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldstagium, a a gigantic epic deer steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Steel Slice. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "steel" or "Goldstagium". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, deer-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Standing majestic among peaks, this colossal cervine wields its metal antlers with grace. Its Steel Slice ability shreds rock and foe alike.
